department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: For 5th Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick on an as and when requested basis
description: Request for Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of a variety of lumber to 2nd Non-Commissioned Member training and education centreOromocto, New Brunswick, on an as and when requested basis, for a period of up to 31 october 2024.
